page.description: The Email Client Control displays the default email client. One or more Email Client Controls may appear inside the Format section of a UI_DLG_BOX() or UI_MODELESS_DLG_BOX() function.

argument.name: Width
argument.description: Numeric. The width of the control.

argument.name: Email
argument.description: Character. The variable that contains the default value of the To: field. Note: You must not have any space characters in the finished command.

section.title: Example
section.note: You must not have any space characters in the finished command.
